name: Hollow Knight Demake
description:
Controls:

Keyboard and mouse:

Space - Jump

Left click - Attack

Left click + W - Attack up

Left click + S (While falling) - Attack down

W while over purple cube - Read

W while over bench - Sit

Hold E - Heal

Controller:

A - Jump

X - Attack

X + D Pad UP - Attack up

X + D Pad DOWN (While falling) - Attack down

D Pad UP while over purple cube - Read

D Pad UP while over bench - Sit

Hold B - Heal
